submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfSubstrings(self, s: str) -> int:
        n = len(s)
        p = [-1]
        n0 = s.count('0')
        for i,x in enumerate(s):
            if x == '0': p.append(i)
        p.append(n)
        i, ans = 0, 0
        while i <= n0 and i*(i + 1) <= n:
            n1 = max(i**2, 1)
            ans_i = 0
            #print('i =', i)
            #print('n1 =', n1)
            for j in range(i + 1, n0 + 2):
                #print('j =', j)
                for s in range(p[j - i - 1] + 1, p[j - i] + 1):
                    e = max(p[j - 1] + 1, s + n1 + i)
                    if e > p[j]: break
                    else:
                        #print(s,e)
                        ans_i += p[j] - e + 1
                #print('ans_i =', ans_i)
            ans += ans_i
            #print('ans =', ans)
            i += 1
        return ans
